弄.definition: to do; to manage; to handle; to play with; to fool with; to mess with; to fix; to toy with

弄亂.definition: to mess up; to put into disorder; to meddle with; to confuse

弄假成真.definition: pretense that turns into reality (idiom); to play at make-believe, but accidentally make it true

弄僵.definition: to bring to deadlock; to result in a stalemate

弄到.definition: to get hold of; to obtain; to secure; to come by

弄到手.definition: to get in hand; to get (one's) hands on; to get hold of (in the sense of to acquire)

弄嘴弄舌.definition: to cause a dispute through boastful gossip (idiom)

弄壞.definition: to ruin; to spoil; to break

弄崗穗鶥.definition: (bird species of China) Nonggang babbler (Stachyris nonggangensis)

弄巧反拙.definition: see 弄巧成拙[nong4 qiao3 cheng2 zhuo1]

弄巧成拙.definition: to overreach oneself; to try to be clever and end up with egg on one's face

弄懂.definition: to make sense of; to grasp the meaning of; to figure out

弄懂弄通.definition: to get a thorough understanding of sth (idiom)

弄明白.definition: to figure out how to do something

弄死.definition: to kill; to put to death

弄璋.definition: (literary) to have a baby boy; to celebrate the birth of a son

弄瓦.definition: (literary) to have a baby girl; to celebrate the birth of a daughter

弄走.definition: (coll.) to take (sth) away; to get rid of

弄通.definition: to get a good grasp of

弄錯.definition: to err; to get sth wrong; to miscalculate; to misunderstand

弄髒.definition: to make dirty; to defile; to smear
